hero.eyebrow: Built by Nordhealth — trusted by over 30,000 healthcare professionals across the Nordics.
hero.heading: AI-powered documentation that supports your clinical decision-making.
hero.description: Create high-quality, personalized patient notes in seconds with a solution designed to support your professional judgment.

trust.noTraining:
Patient data not used
for AI model training

generalPractice.title: Care is human. Administration doesn't have to be.
generalPractice.text: Nordhealth Nora automates documentation with clinical accuracy and quality, capturing essential details while preserving your professional voice. You can create multiple clinical documents from a single consultation, significantly reducing administrative workload throughout your day. You maintain full control and responsibility for your notes without automating diagnostics.

psychotherapy.title: Documentation without compromising therapy quality.
psychotherapy.text: Most AI assistants can write notes, but Nordhealth Nora is specifically designed to strengthen your clinical judgment during therapeutic work. Nora structures high-quality patient notes in your own style. This allows you to be fully present for your client without the distraction of a keyboard. By reducing repetitive administrative work and providing a private space for your notes, Nora helps you maintain clinical focus and mentally prepare for the next session.

speechTherapy.title: Precision in every note, for every patient's story.
speechTherapy.text: Speech therapy requires precision that traditional documentation often fails to capture. Nordhealth Nora captures the subtle details of every session, allowing you to track language development and cognitive milestones with complete accuracy. It automatically structures complex assessments into thorough and consistent draft notes that follow your own style. You can focus fully on the client's progress knowing that essential observations will be documented.

physiotherapy.title: Focus on care – Nordhealth Nora handles the notes.
physiotherapy.text: Nora helps physiotherapists create accurate and structured patient notes in seconds – especially during a busy day. With dictation, you can record observations, test results, and exercises while they're fresh. This way, goals and treatment plans are organized as soon as the appointment ends. You can focus fully on the patient instead of the keyboard. End your workday energized and professionally at ease, without notes piling up.

allSpecialties.title: A clinical tool for every specialty.
allSpecialties.text: Nora is developed to support the full range of healthcare services. Regardless of the documentation template you use, our AI adapts to your clinical language and terminology. This ensures that your professional judgment is always conveyed in your notes, regardless of your specialty.

about.title:
Transforming the way AI
supports clinical work.
about.description: We don't just automate notes. We protect the space between the consultation and the patient record. High-quality, structured documentation that you finalize yourself. Every feature we add comes from professional feedback – built by Nordhealth and trusted by over 30,000 Nordic healthcare professionals.

trialBanner.text: Launch offer: only €49 per month – available for a limited time

gdpr.title: GDPR-compliant & EU-hosted
gdpr.description: All data is processed on secure European servers. Original audio is never stored, reused, or retained, and no data is used for AI model training. Read more about our security here.

transcription.title: Session transcription
transcription.description: Capture the entire conversation and any background information you add. Nordhealth Nora converts them into clear text that you can use immediately in your notes – always clinically reviewed and secure.

dictation.title: Live dictation
dictation.description: Naturally dictate your observations and thoughts during or after the appointment. Nora converts your words into clear and accurate text directly for documentation.

askNora.title: Ask Nora to help format your notes
askNora.description: Make them shorter, longer, clearer, or more like your own style. You can also create new documents based on the same session, which you always review and approve before saving.

privateNotes.title: Private notes
privateNotes.description: A private section separate from the official patient record for your own notes and background information. It allows you to freely process clinical observations, assumptions, and reflections between appointments.

filesAdded.label: Files added weekly to private notes

noteQuality.label: Most valued by Nordhealth Nora users

cookie.text: We use cookies to analyze site usage and improve our service.

pricing.title: Choose the right plan for you
pricing.subtitle: Choose from two different packages – getting started is easy.

multiUser.info: Contact us to discuss customized pricing

meta.title: Speech Therapists - Nordhealth Nora
meta.description: Nora handles the transcription, so you can keep your full focus where it belongs, on the patient.

hero.title: Your depth of observation is your greatest clinical tool.
hero.description: Nora handles the transcription, so you can keep your full focus where it belongs, on the patient.
hero.extendedDescription: In speech and language therapy, your attention works on multiple levels. Phonetic detail, non-verbal cues, engagement, response patterns. Holding that depth of observation while documenting is difficult.

items.title: Live Capture
items.description: Capture language detail in real time, including examples, errors, prompts, responses, and progress, without relying on memory after the session.

items.title: Structured Drafts
items.description: Draft clear, structured notes that are organised and ready to review.

items.title: Consistent Phrasing
items.description: Standardise protocols with Phrases. Insert exercises and recurring clinical wording with a short cue, consistently across clients.

items.title: Play-Friendly
items.description: Support paediatric and play-based sessions. Keep interaction flowing while Nora prepares a draft you can finalise right after.

items.title: Full Control
items.description: Stay fully in control. Nothing is saved without your approval.

trust.title: Clinical safeguards
trust.description: EU-hosted. No patient data used to train AI models. No auto-save. You remain the sole author of the record.

testimonial.title: What clinicians say
quotes: "I'm watching the client, not the screen. The draft is there when we finish."
"My notes are more consistent, especially for repeated exercises and language samples."
"It saves time, but more importantly it protects attention during the session."

meta.title: General Practitioners / Doctors - Nordhealth Nora

hero.title: More time for clinical decisions. Less time rewriting.
hero.description: Nora drafts your documentation from the consultation, so you can stay focused on the patient, then review and approve what becomes the record.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.intro: This document addresses key concerns that enterprise customers have about deploying our AI assistant, particularly regarding data storage and usage, as well as privacy, security, and compliance. The AI assistant is designed with privacy-by-design principles and AI security best practices in accordance with EU regulations.

dataStorage.title: Where is data stored?
dataStorage.content: We use only EU-based data centers to provide the service.
list: Denmark: EasyPractice, Physica, and Psykbase Web
AI functionality: AWS and Azure EU data centers

dataProcessing.title: Is data processed outside the EU?
dataProcessing.content: No. All data processing, including transcription, enrichment, and AI-generated summaries, takes place within the UK and EEA. No data is sent to the United States or other third countries.

dataAccess.title: Who has access to data?
dataAccess.content: Only authorized personnel have access to data. All access is logged and monitored.

aiTraining.title: Is patient data used for AI model training?
aiTraining.content: We do not use our customers' data to train AI models. The AI assistant uses models that have been trained on general, non-customer-specific datasets.

aiModels.title: What AI models are used?
aiModels.content: We use models hosted in AWS EU data centers. For transcription, we also use our own speech recognition models located in the UK and EEA.

encryption.title: Is data encrypted?
encryption.content: All data transfers are conducted through secure and encrypted connections. Customers' patient record entries are stored encrypted in secure, state-of-the-art data centers protected by both strong physical and digital security measures.

dataDeletion.title: Can data be deleted or exported?
dataDeletion.content: Yes. Therapists can delete or export transcriptions at any time.

gdpr.title: Are you GDPR-compliant?
gdpr.content: Yes. We are fully GDPR-compliant. As a processor acting on behalf of the data controller, we fulfill our key obligations, including:
list: Strong data security: Extensive technical and organizational measures to protect personal data
Confidentiality: All authorized employees are bound by strict confidentiality agreements
Data breaches: Immediate notification procedures in case of potential breaches
Support for GDPR obligations: We help our customers fulfill their duties to data subjects
Cooperation with authorities: We cooperate with supervisory authorities

subProcessors.title: Can I get a list of all sub-processors?
subProcessors.content: Yes. We maintain a transparent sub-processor register of all vendors with access to personal data.
subProcessors.note: Note: For business and security reasons, we do not publish the names of individual model providers as this is confidential information. However, we guarantee that:
list: All AI-related subcontractors operate in Europe
User data is not transferred or processed outside Europe

certifications.title: What certifications and standards do you follow?
certifications.content: Our systems and processes are regularly audited by independent parties to ensure the highest level of data security.

availability.title: How is availability and uptime ensured?
availability.content: We have continuous monitoring that immediately alerts the development team if the platform loads slowly or not at all. Detected outages are handled with the highest priority. All code changes go through automated and manual testing to ensure update stability and service continuity.

ownership.title: Who owns the patient data?
ownership.content: The company using the service has exclusive ownership of all their patient data.

serviceTermination.title: What happens if we stop using the AI assistant?
serviceTermination.content: Data is deleted after service use ends.

responsibility.title: Who has ownership and responsibility for patient notes created with the AI assistant?
responsibility.content: The therapist is fully responsible for the accuracy and completeness of all patient record entries. While the AI assistant can help create notes, the therapist must review, confirm, and save these entries to the patient record. The AI assistant only assists in the process and does not own the data.

analytics.title: Analytics and cookies
analytics.content: We use Google Analytics and HubSpot to analyze website traffic. Google Analytics collects anonymous data such as the number of pages visited, visit duration, and device type used. The data is used to improve our service.
analytics.optOut: You can prevent Google Analytics data collection by installing the Google Analytics Opt-out browser extension.

privacy.contact: Questions about privacy? Contact us at support@nordhealth.ai
